header.headline: eseom-order-form.header.headline - Order form
header.description: eseom-order-form.header.description - Add description in this snippet.

successModal.headline: Request successful
successModal.successMsg1: Articles successfully added to the cart.

errorModal.headline: Error occurred
errorModal.errorMsg2: No product found with the specified article number.
errorModal.errorMsg5: Quantity of product %productNumber% must not be less than 1.
errorModal.errorMsg6: Product with article number %productNumber% not found.
errorModal.errorMsg7: The article number %productNumber% is a main product with variants. Please enter the article number of a variant.
errorModal.errorMsg8: Stock for product with article number %productNumber% is too low. (Current Stock: %availableStock%)
errorModal.errorMsg9: Stock for product with article number %productNumber% is too low. (Current stock: %availableStock%, quantity of product already in cart: %qtyStockAlreadyInCart%)
errorModal.errorMsg11: The product with article number %productNumber% has a minimum order quantity of %productMinPurchase%.
errorModal.errorMsg13: The product with article number %productNumber% can only be ordered in steps of %productPurchaseSteps%.
errorModal.errorMsg14:
Steps: %productPurchaseSteps% from minimum order quantity
Minimum order quantity: %productMinPurchase%
errorModal.errorMsg15: Maximum sale quantity for article number %productNumber% exceeded. (Current stock: %availableStock%, Quantity that is already in the cart: %qtyStockAlreadyInCart%, maximum sale quantity: %productMaxPurchase%)
errorModal.errorMsg17: Product is a main product - please enter a article number of a variation.
errorModal.errorMsg19: No valid variations found for this product.

twigExtensions.successMsg1: Products found that should be pre-filled.
twigExtensions.errorMsg1: No products found that should be pre-filled.
